name: Shape Sorter (Alex25820)
description:
In Shape Sorter your goal is to complete a series of levels by making sure the correct shapes enter the correct goals. This is done by placing a variety of different objects in the level that bounce the shapes to the correct place.

Shape sorter was made during 3 days for SGC Jam 2023. The theme for the game jam was Organized Chaos.

The game also had to include at least 3 of 9 challenges. The challenges I choose to complete were:

  • DIY Sounds - Record all the sounds yourself.
  • Color Coded - Only use 4 colors.
  • Who is the best - Include some sort of point and high-score system.
